Package org.drools.resource

Interface Summary
ResourceHandler Resource handler for interace that all implementations must provide.
 

Class Summary
BaseResourceHandler This class is the base resource handler that includes attributes/methods that all sub-classes will need.
RepositoryBean The repository elements that can be referenced via URL will typically have several attributes including a unique URL, resource type, name, version and of course content.
ResourceType  
SvnResourceHandler Resource Handler implementation for subversion.
